item.title: 香港豪宅印花税上调，因销售回暖
item.description: 香港正提高豪宅交易印花税，此前该市场近期交易活动异常活跃。【原文：Hong Kong is hiking stamp duty for luxury home transactions following a recent flurry of activity in the market.】

item.title: 西班牙住房乱象：占屋者与滞留业主对峙
item.description:
随着西班牙房地产市场达到沸点，数万套被占用的房屋正待售。

【原文：

Tens of thousands of occupied homes are for sale as Spain’s housing market reaches a boiling point.

】

item.title: 南非股市强劲上涨面临经济增长障碍
item.description: 南非市场正乘着数年未见的乐观浪潮前行。这种势头能否持续，取决于一个关键因素：经济增长。【原文：South African markets are riding a wave of optimism that hasn’t been seen in years. Whether that lasts depends on one thing: economic growth.】

item.title: 民调显示瑞士即将把现金纳入宪法
item.description: 瑞士下月将把现金流通权写入宪法，彰显民众对实物货币的坚持——尽管数字支付已成主流，但民众仍希望实体货币得以保留。【原文：Switzerland looks set to enshrine the availability of cash in its constitution next month, manifesting a public desire that physical money must remain despite the widespread shift toward digital payments.】

item.title: 马来西亚Zetrix公司完成融资，计划将人工智能部门在纳斯达克上市
item.description: 马来西亚上市数字基础设施供应商Zetrix AI Bhd.从世界银行投资部门筹集了约4000万美元资金，并计划在年底前将其人工智能部门在纳斯达克上市。【原文：Zetrix AI Bhd., a publicly traded Malaysian provider of digital infrastructure, raised about $40 million from the World Bank’s investment arm and is preparing to list its artificial intelligence unit on Nasdaq by year-end.】

item.title: 若伊朗与美国紧张局势升级，石油行业将面临何种风险
item.description: 美国与伊朗之间不断升级的紧张局势已将油价推至六个月高点。石油交易商正密切关注任何可能扰乱伊朗原油生产或促使伊朗政府封锁该地区多家主要能源出口国所依赖的关键航运路线的局势升级。【原文：Rising tensions between the US and Iran have already driven oil prices to a six-month high. Oil traders are watching for any escalation that could disrupt crude production in Iran or prompt its government to block a critical shipping route used by several major energy exporters in the region.】

item.title: 中国同维公司竞购竞争对手，加速太阳能行业整合
item.description: 中国多晶硅巨头通威公司计划收购一家规模较小的国内竞争对手，该行业正致力于缓解太阳能电池板材料长期供过于求的局面。【原文：Chinese polysilicon giant Tongwei Co. plans to buy a smaller domestic rival, as the industry bids to shrink chronic oversupply of the solar-panel material.】

item.title: 赞比亚官员称非洲债务风险被“夸大”
item.description: 赞比亚财政部官员指出，非洲主权债务中被低估的风险正导致该大陆额外承担数十亿美元的债务偿还成本，并制约着关键的经济增长。【原文：Mispriced risk in African sovereign debt is costing the continent billions of dollars in additional debt-service payments and constraining critical economic growth, according to a Zambian Treasury official.】

item.title: 全球基金时隔17个月再度超越印度股票本地买家
item.description: 受企业盈利动能改善及估值水平回落的推动，2月份外国资金流入印度股市的规模有望首次在17个月内超过国内机构需求。【原文：Foreign inflows into Indian equities in February are set to surpass domestic institutional demand for the first time in 17 months, aided by signs of improving earnings momentum and easing valuations.】

item.title: Anthropic在与竞争对手的赛跑中为人工智能安全政策添加了警告条款
item.description: 以致力于人工智能安全保障而闻名的Anthropic公司，近日放宽了其核心安全政策，称此举是保持竞争力的必要之举。【原文：Anthropic PBC, known for its commitment to artificial intelligence safeguards, has loosened its central safety policy, saying the change is necessary to remain competitive.】

item.title: 日元兑美元汇率回吐涨幅，因日本央行提名候选人立场偏鸽派
item.description: 日元兑美元汇率回吐了早盘涨幅，此前首相高市早苗领导的政府于周三提名了两名被视为鸽派的日本央行政策委员会新成员。【原文：The yen erased its earlier gains against the dollar, after Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s government nominated two new Bank of Japan policy board members on Wednesday who are seen as dovish.】

item.title: 加拿大要求OpenAI提交安全计划，此前枪手曾使用ChatGPT
item.description: 加拿大政府表示，在OpenAI公司选择不向警方通报一名不列颠哥伦比亚省青少年通过ChatGPT演练暴力场景的事件后，政府期待该公司提出"具体"的安全措施。【原文：The Canadian government says it expects OpenAI Inc. to present “concrete” safety steps after the company opted not to inform police about a teenager from British Columbia who’d played out violent scenarios on ChatGPT.】

item.title: 高市裕之提名的日本央行通胀派人选推动日元走强，提振股市
item.description: 日本首相高市早苗政府提名两名通胀派学者加入日本央行政策委员会，这一人事安排令日元走弱、股市上涨，投资者由此解读出首相最新释放的亲刺激政策立场信号。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s government nominated two reflationist academics to join the Bank of Japan policy board, proposed appointments that weakened the yen and boosted stocks as investors reflected on the latest sign of the premier’s pro-stimulus policy stance.】

item.title: 人工智能推动台湾股市创20年来最大外资买盘
item.description: 全球基金掀起二十年来最大规模的单日买盘热潮，大举扫货台湾股市，这表明市场对芯片制造商将继续受益于人工智能热潮充满信心，尽管更广泛的市场正面临日益加剧的颠覆性担忧。【原文：Global funds snapped up Taiwanese stocks in their biggest one-day buying spree in two decades, signaling confidence that chipmakers will remain AI-boom beneficiaries, even as broader markets face growing fears of disruption.】

item.title: 美元走软推升亚洲货币升至16个月高点，人民币汇率走强
item.description: 亚洲货币周三升至16个月高点，得益于美元走软和人民币持续升值。【原文：Asian currencies rose to a 16-month high on Wednesday, supported by a weaker dollar and steady yuan appreciation.】

item.title: 印尼发行离岸人民币债券，因财政担忧加剧
item.description: 印尼周三开始发行离岸人民币债券，在东南亚最大经济体面临财政困境的担忧中，测试全球投资者的需求。【原文：Indonesia began marketing bonds denominated in the offshore yuan Wednesday, testing global investors’ appetite amid concerns over fiscal woes in Southeast Asia’s largest economy.】

item.title: 软件浪潮席卷印度消费科技与房地产领域
item.description: Nifty房地产指数是今年迄今表现最差的指数，仅次于IT板块。【原文：The Nifty Realty Index is the worst performer so far this year after IT.】

item.title: 日本财务省据悉正考虑重新划分流动性供应区域
item.description: 知情人士透露，日本财务省正准备重新调整其流动性供应拍卖的分类方式，以期改善市场长期资金领域的状况。【原文：Japan’s Finance Ministry is preparing to reclassify its liquidity supply auctions so it can improve conditions in the long-term zone of the market, according to people familiar with the plan.】

item.title: 韩国股市2.2万亿美元涨势使市值超越法国
item.description: 韩国股市市值已超越法国，这主要得益于科技股的上涨——这些股票正乘着全球人工智能热潮的东风。【原文：South Korea has surged past France in stock market value, propelled by gains in technology shares riding the global boom in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 澳大利亚通胀增速超预期，加息押注升温
item.description: 澳大利亚1月份月度通胀率超出预期，主要受住房成本推动，这表明货币政策可能需要进一步收紧。【原文：Australia’s monthly inflation came in stronger than expected in January, driven largely by housing costs and suggesting monetary policy settings may need to be tightened further.】

item.title: 香港预算案将缩小财政赤字，科技投资成焦点
item.description: 香港财政司司长陈茂波将在年度施政报告中宣布该市财政赤字大幅收窄，这引发市场对政府将推出适度紓困措施及加大创新投资的预期。【原文：Hong Kong Financial Secretary Paul Chan is set to report a significant narrowing of the city’s budget deficit in an annual address, raising expectations for modest relief measures and further investments to spur innovation.】

item.title: 日本钢铁股价暴跌，因市场担忧大规模债券发行
item.description: 日本钢铁公司股价暴跌，此前该公司宣布计划发行近40亿美元债券，用于收购美国钢铁公司。【原文：Nippon Steel Corp. shares slumped after the company said it planned to sell almost $4 billion of bonds to help fund the acquisition of United States Steel Corp.】

item.title: 内存热潮推动韩国股市突破6000点大关
item.description: 韩国股市基准指数在突破5000点这一曾被视为不可企及的里程碑仅一个月后，又跨过新门槛——全球存储器需求激增正推动该国最大芯片制造商持续走强。【原文：Just a month after surpassing the once-unthinkable 5,000 milestone, South Korea’s equity benchmark has crossed another threshold as a surge in global memory demand powers the country’s biggest chipmakers.】

item.title: 自动驾驶初创企业Wayve为自动驾驶出租车战争筹集15亿美元
item.description: 英国自动驾驶软件初创公司Wayve以86亿美元估值完成15亿美元融资，即将与中美竞争对手展开自动驾驶出租车业务的角逐。【原文：Wayve, the UK autonomous driving software startup, has raised $1.5 billion in funding at an $8.6 billion valuation as it prepares to go up against Chinese and US rivals to roll out self-driving taxis.】

item.title: 南非政府债务在里程碑式预算案中见顶
item.description: 南非政府债务在持续攀升近二十年后，终于迎来峰值。这得益于多年来的财政支出控制以及大宗商品驱动的财政收入激增。【原文：South African government debt is finally set to peak after rising for nearly two decades, a payoff from years of spending restraint and a commodities-driven revenue windfall.】

item.title: 瑞银预计最坏情况下私募信贷违约率将达15%
item.description: 几周前，瑞银集团的分析师曾对私募信贷领域的违约风险提出最坏情况的预测。如今他们的预期更为严峻。【原文：A few weeks ago, analysts at UBS Group AG laid out a worst-case scenario for defaults in the private credit sector. Their outlook is even more grim now.】

item.title: 金价连续第二日下跌，因市场预期利率将长期维持不变
item.description: 金价小幅下跌，延续了前一交易日的跌势，因市场预期美联储近期降息的可能性降低。【原文：Gold declined slightly, extending a loss in the previous session, on reduced expectations that the US Federal Reserve will cut interest rates in the near term.】

item.title: 油价小幅走高，交易员权衡伊朗核协议前景
item.description: 油价上涨，因交易员在周四谈判前权衡美伊核协议达成的可能性，而美国在中东的大规模军事部署令市场持续紧张。【原文：Oil rose as traders weighed the odds of a nuclear agreement between the US and Iran ahead of talks on Thursday, as a huge deployment of American forces in the Middle East kept the market on edge.】

item.title: 日银理事会对高市澄子的人事安排或暗示其利率路径立场
item.description: 日本首相高市早苗即将通过提名两名新政策委员会委员——这是她首次进行此类任命——来表明其对日本央行利率路径的偏好。【原文：Japan’s Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi is set to telegraph her preferences for the Bank of Japan’s interest rate trajectory by nominating two new policy board members, in her first such appointments.】

item.title: Workday首席执行官称Anthropic和OpenAI使用其公司软件
item.description: Workday公司首席执行官阿尼尔·布什里表示，像Anthropic这样的领先人工智能公司——投资者担心其将颠覆软件行业——实际上正在使用其公司的产品。【原文：Workday Inc. Chief Executive Officer Aneel Bhusri said leading AI companies like Anthropic — which investors fear will disrupt the software industry — actually use his company’s products.】
